TMF

```{r}

```

```{r}
as.data.frame(t2) %>% 
  group_by(constant) %>% 
  summarise(N = n()) %>% 
  arrange(constant) %>% 
  mutate(Ntot = cumsum(N)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(constant, Ntot)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_bw()
```

```{r forest}
#| message: false
#| warning: false
rast("results/data/forest/tmf.nc") %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  gather(year, value) %>% 
  mutate(year = as.numeric(gsub("tmf_year=", "", year))) %>% 
  mutate(type = recode(value, 
                       "1" = "undisturbed",
                       "2" = "degraded",
                       "3" = "deforested",
                       "4" = "regrowth",
                       "5" = "water",
                       "6" = "other")) %>% 
  group_by(year, type) %>% 
  summarise(N = n()) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(year, N, col = type)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_bw()
```
